name: Tigran Asatryan
description: '''Tigran Arami Asatryan''' ({{langx|hy|Տիգրան Արամի Ասատրյան}}; born April 22, 1975) is an [[Armenia]]n singer and son of famed singer [[Aram Asatryan]]. He is also an ex-[[Greco-Roman wrestling|Greco-Roman wrestler]] and has won the Armenian championship three times.
